title: The Aftermath of the Lionel Messi Mess (Podcast)
itunes:title: The Aftermath of the Lionel Messi Mess (Podcast)
description:
Michael Barr, Mike Lynch and guest host Scalet Fu discuss the biggest stories this week in the Business of Sports. On today’s podcast the trio discusses the aftermath of the Lionel Messi mess, Tokyo 2020’s winners and losers and the plethora of Sports Betting options Michael Barr will see in his Draftking’s account.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
